articles.title: St. Lucie County to launch drive-thru mass COVID-19 vaccination clinic - WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
articles.description: St. Lucie County is hoping to ramp up its efforts to offer the COVID-19 vaccine to residents who are 65 and older.

articles.title: Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine appears to stop variants found in U.K., South Africa - CNBC Television
articles.description: Pfizer's vaccine appears to neutralize the Covid variants found in the U.K. and South Africa. The study was conducted by Pfizer and has not been peer reviewe...
